name: ConntectFour
description: Two players drop coloured discs into a 7x6 grid. You win by connecting 4 discs horizontally, vertically or diagonally.
content:
-------|-------|---RRRR|---YYRY|---YRYY|--YYRRR 		horizontal match
-------|-------|---RRYR|---YRRY|---YRRY|--YYRRY 		vertical match
-------|-------|---RRYR|---YRRY|---YYRY|--YYRRR 		diagonal match ("positive")
-------|-------|---RRYR|---YRRY|---YRYY|--YRYRR 		diagonal match ("negative")


Connect Four is a game in which two players take turns dropping red or yellow coloured discs into a vertically suspended 7 x 6 grid. Discs fall to the bottom of the grid, occupying the next available space.

A player wins by connecting four of their discs horizontally, vertically or diagonally.
